snippet: KASHNER-- Howard, of Scarsdale, NY, died January 4, 2015 at age 75. This caring, ethical, smart, generous, funny, gallant man was admired by his colleagues, teased by his many old friends, lovingly connected with his brothers Len and Frank and his widespread family, adored by his grandchildren Zane, Tessa, Robert Ezra, Mila, and Eva and deeply loved by his wife, Rita, and his daughters, Elisabeth (Jonathan) and Megan (Trina). Rest in peace, you sweet man. Services at Temple Israel Center, 280 Old Mamaroneck Road, White Plains, NY, 12:30pm, Wednesday, January 6. 1/3

Rest in peace, you sweet man. Services at Temple Israel Center, 280 Old Mamaroneck Road, White Plains, NY, 12:30pm, Wednesday, January 6. 1/3
